content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; furnace_source holds available iron ore).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]; fuel inventory includes coal with energy at 1600).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (status: NO_POWER; electrical_id updated to 3016).
- Associated ElectricityGroup (id=3016) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_box contains ≈200 units of water at 15° with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); fluid_system updated to [9740]).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING; fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system updated to [9740]).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9740 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9741 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9742 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9747 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9746 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9751 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9750 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9753 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Repeated Incorrect PipeGroup Fluid System IDs:
  - Multiple connection attempts used fluid_system IDs [9396, 9439, 9482, 9525, 9568, 9611, 9654, 9697] that do not correspond to any active pipeline.
  - Tip: Identify and target the valid fluid_system (e.g., 9740 from the updated pipeline configuration) before initiating a connection.

• Ineffective Stabilization Delays:
  - Recurrent 10-second wait periods after failed connection attempts are not resolving the connectivity issue.
  - Tip: Verify pipeline alignment and operational status prior to delaying, thereby avoiding redundant idle time.

• Persistent Steam Engine Connectivity Issue:
  - Despite repeated connection attempts, the steam engine remains disconnected from both the power network and water supply.
  - Tip: Reevaluate the steam engine’s connection points and reassess the surrounding pipeline network to ensure effective integration.
